propertyResponse:
Hello Bickham family,
Thank you for your review. We are really sorry that your stay experience has not met your expectations completely. We really regret that, since it means a world to us as a small family business.

Below we’ll react on your above mentioned issue:

Regarding the size of the pool. It is small because it’s a jacuzzi or plunge pool instead of swimming pool, like it’s showed on the picture. 
The color of the pool is because the stain of the water we have used in the last of couple months, which won’t go away after several cleaning sessions, but we can ensure you the water is clean, since we are maintaining the pool on weekly base. 
We are planning to repaint the pool after the newyear celebration, to avoid any nuisance to the quests. We hope it’ll give more fresh color to the pool.

Regarding the location: a couple of weeks and days before your arrival and after you have landed on the airport we have tried several times to assist you via whatsapp and also arranged a free pick up service in front of the alley as you have asked us, so that it’s more convenient for you. However if it has not helped your good experience, our apology for that.

At last is regarding the facility, you have booked the room without breakfast but however we have still offered you a free breakfast and also free breakfast to go when you have to go out the homestay very early. We regret if that still hasn’t  made your stay more convenient.

Have a good day, keep safe, keep healthy.

Always good vibes,
Sastro Place team

dislikedText:

Other guests breakfast served outside our room instead of theirs. Mosque was very close and loud. Hard to find, bathroom needs good clean

Regarding other guest was having breakfast in front of your room, which is against our policy, we have talked with and instructed our staff who is on duty on that day. Our apology for that, it won’t happen again.

About the size of the pool. It is small because it’s a jacuzzi or plunge pool instead of swimming pool, like it’s showed on the picture. 
The color of the pool is because the stain of the water we have used in the beginning, which won’t go away after several cleaning sessions, but we can ensure you the water is clean, since we are maintaining the pool on weekly base. 
We are planning to repaint the pool after the newyear celebration. We hope it’ll give more fresh color to the pool.

Regarding the location: a couple of days before your arrival and after you have landed on the airport we have tried to assist you via whatsapp and arranged a free pick up service in front of the alley, so that it’s more convenient for you. likedText: Location a little weird, down a narrow alley not accessible by car but only 2 mins walk max from the main road. Can walk to Malioboro in about 10 or 15 mins. Room was great, nice bathroom and comfy bed.
dislikedText: Pool was more of a hot tub, only the jets didnt work! Still nice to chill in after a long day. Never actually met the staff, friendly shopkeepers next door are main contacts, but the owner was very responsive on Whatsapp, would have been nice to meet face to face tho.
reviewTitle: Wonderful but could have a more personal touch
propertyResponse:
Hello James, 

Thank you for your lovely review and your input. We really appreciate it, it means a lot to us as we are a small business. 

We are happy to hear you did enjoy your stay at our accommodation.
We are sorry you didn’t find the button to switch on/ off the jet and bubbles of the jacuzzi, those are located under the stair. The jacuzzi did work and still does☺️🙏

Regarding the shopkeepers next to the accommodation, they are a part of our staff.
And again we are sorry as owners for not being able to greet you on the location in person. We are still continuing to improve our services. 
We hope when you come back to Yogyakarta again , then we have more employees to greet and help you in person ☺️🙏

Have a good day.

Kind regards,
Sastro Place team

likedText:
It’s a small accommodation with a villa vibe and very quiet, the accommodation is provided with a jacuzzi, it’s very nice for relaxing after a long day travelling in hot weather. The accommodation is provided with self-check in and check out.
The room and the whole accommodation look exactly as on the pictures, everything is new and well styled with a lot of love, I think. The room is very good and clean. The bed is very comfortable, and the staff is very friendly and very responsive if you ask them about some information. The location of the accommodation is very nearby the city center and the sultan palace, also to the train station, It’s everything on walking distance like 15 minutes. The accommodation is in the middle of a local neighborhood, so you can walk around to take a look, we felt very safe. There are also a lot of small food stalls or shop in the neighborhood.
If we come back to Yogyakarta again, we will come back again to Sastro Place.
dislikedText: Nothing

Serviabilité, disponibilité, hospitalité ⭐️⭐️⭐️Situé dans une rue calme,chambres confortables. Service au delà de nos espérances, breakfast-packet pour notre excursion matinale à Borobudur et  garde des bagages au delà de l’heure du Check out.
Une adresse que nous ne pouvons que recommander.
I dettagli fanno di questa struttura un piccolo paradiso .. tutto perfetto … colazione ottima .. piscina con idromassaggio dopo una gg in giro il top 🔝🔝super consigliato

likedText: The location was strategic and close to the centre which good for a walker like me.
The location was good for tourists as it is located right behind the Yogyakarta train station, just a 3 minutes walk. However, you may find much better hotels that are also located near the station.
dislikedText:
The bathroom's smell was unbearable, you'll smell the weird odour everytime you open the bathroom door and step into the bathroom. Although there is a ventilation fan, the smell still remains there. My partner even complained that she could smell it during the mid night. This was something weird as I did not smell anything when the bathroom door is closed, but she did. Additionally, she said that the smell went away in the morning, which is even weirder. 

Besides the bathroom smell, the room is quite old with many stains on the wall. The bed and bedsheet of our room was also quite dirty, and we had to request for a change of the sheets. You can definitely find a much better place to stay for the same price.
reviewTitle: NOT WORTH IT. DIRTY. SMELLY. LOOK ELSEWHERE!

I could even see the light from other room. So uncomfortable! I won't recommend to stay here if you want a peaceful and comfortable sleep.

likedText:
Many others have commented, but everything actually is perfect. I rarely give 10/10, but everything from the welcome, service, the staff, the bed (soft but not too soft), the room, the cleaning, the ambience to the breakfast and the price was fabulous. A home from home and I will without a doubt return. 
You really have to go to experience it...
And a special thanks for a truly yummy packed breakfast for the temple tour and for finding lost cards in the room without any fuss.
dislikedText: Zilch, nada, niente, rien, nichts, nothing.

likedText: The Rumah Jawa is just the place I needed to come home to and relax. It's close enough to comfortably reach the station, landmarks and restaurants, but also in a relatively quiet area of Jogja. The staff is super accommodating and was helpful with some tips, which made my stay all the more valuable.
Everything

likedText: Tastefully decorated rooms, great value for money, in a very good quiet location, close to some nice  restaurants and the owner was always on hand to arrange for everything.

We felt truly taken care of the entire time. From wonderful generous breakfast, to free 24/7 drinks and snacks, to the kindest Miss Neni's organizing our activities, to the memorable chats with the Uncle, to the visually most pleasing view in from  any angle at the property, to the serene prayer room, coffee shop next door, we loved and cherished it all!
dislikedText: we didn't like that we couldn't stay longer.

likedText: Exzeptionell! Tee, Ginger, bakery allways for free in the most beautiful internal yard. Personal extremely helpful and qualified. Great place!
Breakfast fabulous. Location lovely and peaceful.Manager was very kind and helpful. Owner very charming and all staff very friendly.
dislikedText: Nothing could have been better

likedText: Its so clean, all the staff are super friendly and helpful, the hotel provides drinks and snacks for free..feels like staying at a family's place really. I definitely will recommend others to stay here!

Great looking accommodation in a traditional Javan house (hence the name). Beds are comfortable and the room has a decent size. Friendly and helpful staff that even provided breakfast when we left early for a tour. Regular breakfast does not have a lot of choice (local food and one dish per day) but tastes pretty good.
dislikedText: Location is not great as there hardly decent restaurants nearby, but it’s a 10 minute and €2 taxi to Malioboro street (or 30 minute walk). Breakfast on the first day was a set menu without asking for dietary restrictions beforehand, so please be aware of that. There was no duvet cover which is unusual. Cleaning could be better as we found several hairs right after arrival. The message about only accepting married couples should be made clear before you book (without cancellation option), even though nobody asked about it at check-in.

likedText: A lovely hidden gem in Yogjakarta, small boutique hotel with lovely decoration, very friendly people, super comfortable bedding and delicious breakfast. Around the hotel are enough shops and restaurants. The nicest hotel we stayed in in Indonesia. Top
dislikedText: Nothing

likedText: Excellent Indonesian breakfast with a different selection everyday.

Everything! The minute I stepped into the property, I knew I chose the right place to stay. The architecture of the house is traditional as well as modern. From the entrance to the courtyard, it is beautifully decorated with natural plants, trees, carved teak furniture and koi pond. Every staff was excellent.
dislikedText: Nothing to complain.
reviewTitle: It is a little paradise from a very busy street of Yogyakarta.

likedText:
Even fresher then you expect. Lovely fishes pool, extremely friendly staff (gave us opportunity to take a bath after long day, even technically we weren't hotel guests anymore).
Very good breakfast. Also free snacks and drinks 24h.
dislikedText: We were disappointed after receiving unfriendly notification about lgbt and unmarried couples (haven't been brought during stay) but after warmth we received from the stuff, we can't go less then 9/10.

likedText:
We had a very nice stay at Rumah Jawah guest house.
The location is a little walk to the city center and restaurants but we don’t mind walking and exploring. The house itself was beautiful. Very nice garden en beautiful architecture.
dislikedText: After reading the reviews we expected it to be very clean and where a little disappointed by that. Don’t get me wrong, it wasn’t dirty but the room itself could be cleaner.

likedText: Super nice looking house. It‘s a mix of javanese and dutch colonial style house. Very kind and helpful staff. They recommended a hiking tour to mount Merbabu, which was very nice! Location is a quite place.
dislikedText: Nothing

likedText: Very clean, close to street food at tamsis, linen and comforter are very clean with very good fragrant
dislikedText: None

likedText: Besides the charming character of the authentic house also the great care of the staff. It was like a home away from home and I experienced peace in this house. The breakfast was equally great. It mentions Syariah and my experience was a great sense of respectfulness, stillness and occasionally at some distant, eloquently sung prayers.
dislikedText: nothing negative about the property. I found only one option for restaurants within walking distance and even through the food was more than great, it was like a brightly lid car showroom

likedText: love the environment. we came on monday, not many customer so we are at peace.

reviewTitle: Thank you for this great stay. The staff and owner where very kind and helpful. Every day different and fresh breakfast.

likedText: All was great. The staff made us feel at home. They were genuinely friendly and very helpful. Breakfast was delicious. Great Indonesian food. The tea and cucumber drinks were a delight. The location was also perfect. The rooms were lovely and the courtyard a small oasis of peacefulness.
reviewTitle: To us it felt like a small piece of paradise within the bustling city of Yogyakarta.

likedText: The rooms are very comfortable and clean. The breakfast is amazing; so many options ( you may possibly have the entire Indonesia food culture tour). The staff were very nice and polite. Room service and laundry available. Great place for shopping as it's in Malioboro. The street is a 5 minute walk for shopping. Lots of great food joints as well, nearby. And all major operators like booking.com or Cloock/ get your Guide gives easy pickup from the property if you book any tours. Also you'll find a lot of local tour agencies on this road, they offer cheap and best ways to travel across the land and cover all major attractions.: Borobudur is an hour drive and you can reach Prambanan is 45 minutes from here by car.

likedText:

dislikedText: Nothing

likedText: Joni was a great host and I had a nice stay. The room is basic and local. It was quiet at night althouth it is right in the middle of the happening in a cute small street. . You can refill water and help yourself with free tee & coffee. Joni helped me a lot with planing my adventures. Yes the showers are cold but as you never really get that cold in indonesia, its really refreshing & not that cold. He and his wife made me feel home & welcome. Don't forget to check out the rooftop terracce. Recommand this place and would come back any time. 🫶😊

The room was clean, and the balcony was nice to have! Private bathroom and air conditioning. Like most places in Indonesia, the shower only has cold water, which is refreshing after a hot day!
I highly recommend paying the small fee daily for breakfast! Let them know your choice and time in the morning, and he will have it ready on the rooftop dining table! You have a choice of fried rice with egg, fried noodles with egg, egg on toast, or  their famous banana pancake! (One whole banana wrap in a crepe with chocolate drizzle) 

The owner also offers a very clean, comfortable private car to all the attractions at a fair price.

The owners are very kind and helpful. The hotel is small with 12 rooms and a shared rooftop. It is located in a small alley with a lot of little restaurants. Alley way is very quiet, and no scooters are allowed to drive in alley. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from the train station. (Alley is right across from the station). It is also only a 5-minute walk to Maliboro Street with tones of shopping!

Our host went above and beyond when our train was canceled due to an accident and walked us personally to the train station to help us secure another other arrangement. 

We would deffinatly stay again and totally recommend this place, thank you!
dislikedText: Nothing

likedText:

I don’t like the dark room and also the bed is together with the walls and you don’t have a lot of space. No hot shower. But is pretty fair from what you pay.

No basin to wash up, everything in 1 share bath with toilet that does not have basin and the floor is practically always wet. Electricity will trip whole house if u attempt to blow your hair. Frosted pane on the bedroom door (can see inside) I wonder why. Did not install net in the bedroom so mosquitoes n insects all can join u in the room as u sleep. It's a big orchestra of dogs n cats n music ( although owner plays very nice selection) n sometimes also with motorcycle, and early morning neighbors start chatting with owners  as they walk past.

likedText: Очень приветливый хозяин, говорящий по-английски, который сразу предоставил нам в аренду байк, чтобы мы осмотрели древние храмы в окрестностях и помогал советами. Антураж комнаты очень простой, но красивый. Если  соседнем номере не будет гостей, то у вас будет личное жильё с туалетом и второй комнатой.
dislikedText:
Само помещение очень маленькое.
Горячая вода в Джокьякарте идёт только днём и маленькой струйкой, так что при выборе проживания в этом городе не стоит обращать внимание на плохие отзывы о ванных комнатах - они здесь везде одинаковые.

Cuando llegamos al hotel nos dijeron que tenían un overbooking, esa noche y que nuestra reserva no podían tomarla en cuenta porque ya el cuarto estaba ocupado.
Yo entiendo que eso puede pasar, pero hubiera preferido no enterarme al llegar al sitio, y poder buscar con calma otra cosa. Booking tienea opción de cancelar una reservación y enviar mensajes a los huéspedes, eso no es una excusa.
Nos devolvieron el valor de la noche pagada, en eso fueron honestos.

likedText: Lo mejor: la ubicación, habitación amplia y el exterior del alojamiento. Nos dejaron dejar las mochilas durante el día antes de coger tren nocturno a Malang ;)
dislikedText:
El personal no sabía comunicarse en inglés ni tenía respuesta de dudas básicas sobre sus propios servicios (tours que ofrecían, moto que alquilaban...), debían siempre preguntarlo "al staff" y luego nos decían, se hacía bastante poco operativo, pero terminaban resolviendo. También nos dejaron dejar las mochilas durante el día (bien!), pero en la entrada del alojamiento porque ellos estaban ahí 24h, decían, cuando fuimos por la tarde no había nadie y tardó en volver casi 2 horas, así que nos quedamos nosotros revisando las mochilas. Ningún drama tampoco, pero por saberlo.
No iban los dispensadores de gel de la ducha y las puertas de las duchas no cerraban.

dislikedText: La salle de bain commune n'est pas terrible : les toilettes juste à côté de la douche sont toujours mouillées du coup. Et comme on doit enlever ses chaussures dans cette maison, on a toujours les pieds mouillés pour aller aux toilettes. Les autres douches sans toilettes sont correctes.

likedText: Bathroom was nice and shower very good (but limited) and good convenient location to get to town. Bottled water provided everyday which was nice. Kettle and tea coffee provided too. Clean.
dislikedText: Not sure why it's so highly rated. Don't get me wrong it was good, but not a 9/10. As all other reviews mention, the road outside is VERY noisy. We read this and we live in a city, so we thought it would be fine, but it's insanely loud, we couldn't even have a conversation at some points as we couldn't hear each other. Plus the bed situation, it did say twin beds, so again we knew, but I didn't expect the second bed to be just a pull out mattress. Shower was good, but hot water tank was very small, you have to be super quick, washing hair as fast as possible otherwise hot water runs out, and there definitely not enough water for 2 showers back to back, so we had to plan shower time haha.

The scooters in the street make some noise at night so earplugs are important. 

Its also very clean, comfortable and safe. Definately a great place to stay in Yogyakarta.

propertyResponse:
Good morning everyone,

We understand that bedbug issues can occur in any hotel at any time. As a hotel, we take such complaints seriously and always carry out thorough sterilization procedures immediately if there is any report of bedbugs in one of our rooms. This is the most responsible action we can take in such situations.

It's important to note that bedbugs can appear suddenly, often brought in by travelers via backpacks or suitcases from other places. These items can serve as mediums for cross-contamination, allowing bedbugs to spread unknowingly from one location to another.

In the recent case where a guest complained about bedbugs in their room, we immediately offered to move them to a different room. However, the guest refused this option and instead became upset, insisting on a refund for the next two nights of their stay.

Following this, our staff conducted a full inspection, dismantling the bed and mattress, but we did not find any signs of bedbugs. Based on this, we suspect the guest may have already found another hotel more aligned with their preferences and created the bedbug story in an attempt to get a refund.

We would also like to highlight that although the guest initially complained about bedbugs, they also began raising unrelated issues, including complaints about our swimming pool. This further reinforces our belief that their intention may have been to leave and seek a refund, rather than address a genuine issue.

This situation has caused us considerable distress, especially as we strive to be transparent by clearly listing room sizes, amenities, and photographs for every room type on platforms like Booking.com. We are committed to providing a clean, comfortable environment for all our guests and take all feedback seriously. However, we also believe it's important to protect ourselves from unjust claims that can harm our reputation.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
[Hotel Management]

likedText: The bed and room is so comfortable even though there was only fan.. Walking distance to malioboro and eatery place.. wifi connection is fast and there is a proper parking spot for motorcycles and cars..
dislikedText: Nothing.. everything is great..

likedText: The location was great, very close to most of the things that we wanted to do.
dislikedText: The room had no air conditioner. Considering that we are in a tropical area, it was difficult for me to sleep.
reviewTitle: The room and facility was good, it would have been great if the room had a/c.

likedText: Close to rail station. Staff are friendly.
dislikedText: Restaurant no longer operating. Dim lighting. Water ran out whilst showering, leaving me covered in lather. Very old and worn out fixtures. No safety box.

likedText: All the staff are very friendly
dislikedText: Didn’t have hair dryer

likedText: Pool was a real bonus. Staff were lovely and rooms were great

There was no breakfast also no restaurant.
Tre church music practice next door was lousy.

Near the Tugu station, easy to take train to Jogjakarta airport.
The staffs are helpful.
dislikedText:
The room is equipped with only fan. The room quite warm. There was cockroaches and mosquitos. And almost all day long and night very loud music from nearby karaoke house. I can't have a nice and calm sleep.
The WiFi is not so strong and sometimes no Internet at all.

likedText: Staff were lovely, helpful and friendly. Building is lovely and the pool (which is definitely bigger than a mere plunge pool) was a wonderful way to start and finish the day
reviewTitle: A real home from home - would definitely use again

likedText: Central location. 300 meter from the Jalan Malioboro and also just 300 meter to the train station where i needed to catch the airport train. Staff is friendly. Place is quiet so easy to rest. Other travelers easy to engage with.
dislikedText: I stayed here 15 years ago. Same as my Australian neighbor. Although Bladok still in name is Hotel and “restaurant”, no food is served anymore. That was a disappointment. Before when they were still doing that they had some great tasting dishes for reasonable prices, like a super good nasi goreng with a cold beer. Having to go out for dinner was a definite drawback. Also no breakfast was served anymore.
reviewTitle: Good for a restful stay in simple accommodations, easy to socialize, but missed the food and beverag

likedText: Nicely laid out and comfortable room - my unairconditioned room was very comfortable with the fan. Great location - walking distance from train station and close to Jalan Malioboro

likedText: Truly friendly staff. Good value for money. Simple yet comfortable rooms. Aircon and pool were very welcome.
dislikedText: Shower head needed replacing, but it worked well enough.
reviewTitle: Made my one-night stay in Yogyakarta a pleasure. I’d stay here again.

likedText: The staff were very helpful and we had a very relaxing 3 days. The pool was an added bonus. Thanks for a great holiday.
Very close to Malioboro Street. Near to the only bar I could find called Lucifers which had live bands. Room good.
dislikedText: This will sound weird, but the shower was so hot you couldn't stand under it. It was boiling. Whatever setting I put it on even cold, the water was boiling hot.

likedText: Centrally located and nice and helpful staff.
dislikedText: Rooms and beds were a bit smelly (not so fresh).

likedText: Position, 5 minutes to train station and to malioboro
dislikedText: Room was on the corridor with no external windows, noise from the road

likedText: The perfect place in Jogja ! The staff helps you with everyting. Very nice swimming pool. I will come back.
dislikedText: Nothing

likedText: Best cheap hotel so far and with free SWIM POOL.
The staff was very friendly and helpful.

nice
dislikedText: no

dislikedText: Bathroom could be improved

likedText: No complaints. Good location - 5 min+ walk to Yogya train station. Booked an air con double room. Clean, friendly staff, good air con and showers, good wifi, kettle with coffee/tea, comfortable bed, extra clean towels on request. Pool was very nice and refreshing.

dislikedText:
praying speakers at 4am
dirty tiny bathroom
propertyResponse: i am so sorry for your complain because the day is prophet Muhammad day...

likedText: Breakfast some of food cold location very good
dislikedText: Maybe the workers more attention to customer need help

likedText:
The room is ok, spacious, but it was dirty, specially the bathroom. The breakfast and laundry service provided delivered.

There is a lot of garbage around the area.

We didn’t see the staff rest.
reviewTitle: Ok for short stay but not very clean.

likedText:
I feel like this place could be very very nice but it's being left to decline a little. They need to upkeep it and put a little effort in. 

The breakfast is pretty good. We got chicken rice bowl each morning. Comes with either Americano or tea. 

The bed was big and comfy. 

They have a water machine. 

WiFi was good. 

Water was hot in the shower. 

Location was in town and had a car park.
dislikedText:
Place is declining and needs some tlc. Had mold on bedroom ceiling. Shower was blocked and not draining. Black hairs in shower. 

Biggest downfall is the lack of soundproofing. You can hear everything. There is a school opposite and you can hear them start every morning at 7am. They scream over a microphone. Then they do sports out the front. There is also a mosque that you can hear from 4am. So bring ear plugs. 

Bedroom has poor lighting.

The staff were very smiley and polite but they were not trained or didn't care enough maybe I don't know. But you would have breakfast or coffee in the morning and come back at 5pm and it still wasnt cleaned up. You asked them for restaurant recommendations and they just say a street name to go down. You ask for scooter rental and they suggest the most expensive place in Indonesia. A little more service wouldn't go a miss. 

Also the breakfast comes with Americano. We asked to pay more and make it a latte. This wasn't possible. Only if we paid for a latte full price. Small thing but maybe it's staff training.
reviewTitle: Nice place but needs some tlc

likedText: We had a very nice stay here. The place is nice and clean and the staff was very sweet!
The room was spacious and clean and the bed was comfy. The staff was accommodating with any requests we had. Location was good and not too far from points of interest (within 10 mins grab).
dislikedText:
The first room we were given had a really strong smell of damp so we had to ask to be changed. The staff were very accommodating though and we were eventually swapped to a room we felt more comfortable in. The room was spacious and clean but there was not much space to actually put your belongings. There was also a lack of a fridge so you could not keep any of your water or drinks cold. 

Also, despite paying for breakfast we still had to pay for drinks separately which felt unreasonable.
reviewTitle: Overall, a decent stay in Yogyakarta and good value for money option.

likedText: Modern, clean simply furnished. Nice location as it was fairly easy to walk to lots of interesting areas.

The location is only 3 minutes walking to Pasar Ngasem a great place to grab your traditional breakfast. The room is so spacious. I am recommend you to spend time there and absolutely will back to this place if I visit Jogja in the future.
None
dislikedText: Poor staffing. The room electronic key was placed not near the entrance of the door but exactly opposite area. No soap near the sink

Definitely my fav place in Jogja if you prefer travel by motorbike or walking around. Highly recommend here.
dislikedText: Nothing to complain about.

The free breakfast is another amazing part of the home stay, it’s delicious. Must stay place, thank you everyone! We wished we could stay for longer😊😊😊😊😊

hostel is clean and nice owner and staff.

likedText: Great location in a very nice street. Central but quiet with very homely atmosphere. Very clean, enough bathrooms so no waiting. Good new mattresses with clean sheets. Towels and toiletries provided. Kitchen, living room, terrace, garden, lots of places to chill. Good AC in dorms.  But the two ladies that run the place are what makes it extra special. You will feel safe and cared for and you will want to stay more. Breakfast was during my 7 days stay always traditional Indonesian and always different and always delicious. Water refill, coffee and tea all day as well. Value for money exceptional. This place is special.
Christine and the staff were super lovely and helpful all the time. Place was clean and quiet and they were cooking local food breakfast for us every morning.

likedText:
The guesthouse is located in the center of the town, with all the must-see attractions at a walking distance. 

The owner is extremely responsive in WhatsApp and give the best recommendations and assistance with transport out of Yogya. 

The staff is very nice, breakfast is delicious and the property is very clean.

dislikedText: I don’t have any bad comments, everything was great!
roomInfo: Double Room with Fan - Shared Bathroom

likedText:
This homestay place is amazing! People who manage this place are really kindhearted.
Breakfast is just superb!

I highly recommend this homestay! Everything was perfect!
-Room: Spacious, clean, with a comfy bed where I slept like a baby. Even if I choose the room with a fan, it was never too hot in it (they also have rooms with a/c if you need it)
-Bathrooms: Really clean, no bad smell, good water pressure, one of the showers have hot water, and there is a good ratio bathroom/number of guests
-Breakfast: DELICIOUS!! Everyday they serve something different, always so tasty and good size portions. They also care if you have allergies or preferences (Indonesian food or not)
-Location: The homestay is located in a really quiet green street with lots of trees where it feels cooler than the rest of the city. The neighborhood is safe, and you are close to everything 
-Common areas: Spacious and clean, and there is a garden with tables to chill and drink your coffee :) 
-Owner: She is a really nice person, can help you by giving you any informations about things to see, activities to do, places to go, and how to get there!

I really enjoyed my stay and would not hesitate to book again if I come back to Yogya!!
roomInfo: Double Room with Fan - Shared Bathroom

likedText: Really nice owners and great breakfasts that change daily. The owner even prepared an early breakfast when I had to leave before the normal time. Relatively close to restaurants and markets.

likedText: The owner is very friendly and provided me a breakfast to-go when I had to leave early
reviewTitle: You will do nothing wrong booking by Ndlalem Diajeng

likedText: It has a good yard to chill. Also there is tea and coffee and cold water 24/7. Also breakfast is really good.

The location is so quiet and chilling.
The guesthouse has comfortable and big rooms, large garden where you can taste the delicious homemade coffee and breakfast, which is different everyday!
The owner is the most welcoming I've ever met, they also provide a super cheap motorbike rental and the moto condition is perfect! I reached with it the seaside and borobudur temple with no problem at all!
Had the best slept of my years in SEA, stayed 3 night but I really would like to stay longer!
Rate quality/price top level!
Thanks a lot! I will come back for sure!

likedText: Hotel muy cerca de la estación de Yogyakarta, por lo que es perfecto por si llegas tarde. Es un hotel de mínimos para pasar una noche, pero todo muy limpio y en muy buen estado. Mi habitación era interior y no había ruido.

likedText: Good standard. Good location

likedText: The room is spacious, the foods in the restaurant were delicious and the staffs were extremely nice and helpfull.
The rooftop (try Peach ice tea , laundry was perfect.
dislikedText: The loby and the Pillow was too hard

likedText: We arrived late into Malioboro , having taken the train from Jakarta and got an upgrade upon arrival:) . The room was spacious, very clean  and comfy. When we needed anything , there was no delay by staff too respond to our requests. For instance we had required an iron board and an adaptor and these were delivered quite promptly to our room. The massage services at the hotel was also very good . There are various places to relax such as a cafe on the ground floor and the pool and restaurant at the top and second floor. Sunrises were beautiful against the backdrop of Mt Merapi. The hotel is just across from the train station and round the corner of Malioboro street . There are plenty of options to eat and shop including a mall along Malioboro street. It is easy to catch pedicabs from anywhere to get around to Kraton or there in the train or bus that you can catch to Prambanan temple.
dislikedText: Everything was good
reviewTitle: Spacious , clean room with great service and excellent accessibility

likedText: The location is perfect. If you use train to go in and out Yogyakarta, it’s the hotel that just in front the train station. Bed are firm not soft, room are always clean. It had a sky lounge for late night dinner. I like that they provide Jamu.
dislikedText: Breakfast was ok but needs lots of improvement in bread and pastry section. Most of the are stale.
reviewTitle: A nice stay near the train station.

likedText: Very nice and modern hotel. Amazing breakfast buffet. Next to the crowded Malioboro street and next to the central station with direct trains to the airport. We enjoyed the rooftop swimming pool.

Good size room, comfy bed, clean room & shower. No carpet in room which makes it cleaner as carpet tend to trap dust & hair. Shower water pressure, hair dryer speed are good. Restaurant food quite ok. In-house massage but only 3 therapist available so need to book in advance.
dislikedText: Aircon seems to be central control although there is a switch on wall. TV connection always hang which can be a bit irritating. Noise from next door, train horn, train station announcement whole night can be heard. Not suitable for light sleeper.

likedText: Love the location
dislikedText: Room.aircon can be colder. At night sweating caise the room not cold

likedText: An amazing hotel. Highly recommended.  Staff are amazing, rooms very comfortable, breakfast delicious, and there were water fountains in the corridors with drinking water, saving on the use of plastic bottles. A great initiatve.  Thank you for a great week staying at your hotel.

Thank you so much for your amazing review and recommendation.

We’re truly delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay from our comfortable rooms and delicious breakfast to the service provided by our team. It’s also wonderful to know you appreciated our drinking water stations, we’re committed to reducing plastic waste, and it means a lot when our guests value that initiative.

It was a pleasure having you with us for the week, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another great stay in the future.

likedText: Very high class hotel. The staff are fantastic, so kind and go out of their way to assist you. Rooms were spacious, nicely decorated and brightly lit, and a lovely elegant bathroom. Breakfast had lots of options, all of which were superb. A really vast range of choices. The dinner was also really excellent with a very good chef. The cafe attached to the hotel was great also, and we appreciated the complimentary tea in reception everyday. We went to the spa and that was good too. The hotel is amazing value for money, and in a good location. It is literally 2 minutes from the train station and a short walk to Malioboro street. All in all, an excellent hotel.
dislikedText: A few minor points. The egg station advertises poached eggs but I’m not sure they really know how to cook these. Also, we ate dinner in the hotel twice because we were tired after long day trips and the atmosphere could have been improved. The staff were setting up for breakfast so there were lots of sounds of cutlery being put away and floor sweeping/cleaning. We were a bit hurried to finish our food so they could pack up, even though we were not eating late (we went for dinner at about 6:30/7?). Maybe this was because there were no other diners. This didn’t create a relaxing dining experience, but felt like a rushed meal. This was a shame as the food was superb. But these are only very small points as the hotel was overall fantastic :)
reviewTitle: Excellent hotel, luxury and good value for money
propertyResponse:
Dear Mr. Ray,

Warmest greetings from Royal Malioboro by Aston..

Thank you very much for taking the time to share such a detailed and thoughtful review of your recent stay with us.

We’re truly delighted to know that you enjoyed the comfort of our rooms, the variety and quality of our breakfast, as well as the hospitality from our team. It’s wonderful to hear that the dinner experience, spa, and overall value made your stay memorable. Your kind words mean a lot to us and will be shared with the entire team.

At the same time, we sincerely appreciate your constructive feedback regarding the egg station and the atmosphere during dinner service. We apologize that the poached eggs did not meet expectations. Our culinary team will be re-briefed to ensure preparation techniques align with international standards.

We’re also sorry to hear that the dinner environment felt rushed due to the breakfast setup. This is certainly not the experience we aim to deliver. Your feedback has been shared with our Restaurant and F&B teams to adjust the timing and approach of setup activities, ensuring a more relaxing and enjoyable dining ambiance for our guests.

Once again, thank you for highlighting both the strengths and the areas where we can grow. We truly value your input and hope to welcome you back for an even better experience on your next visit to Yogyakarta.

Warm Regards,
Vera Indah Pratiwi
General Manager

likedText: Staff was receptive.
reviewTitle: Laura , one of their staff at Restaurant was exceptionally good to us . Since we are Vegetarians, though they had good c

likedText: Extremely well-maintained, and close to everything, no need for a cab if you’re arriving by train. Nice breakfast, comfy bed, great water pressure.
dislikedText: My only suggestion would be to prohibit smoking  on the 2nd floor outdoor dining area.. Indonesia has a lot of smokers, there’s limited outdoor seating. Believe it or not, restricting smokers will actually attract more guest.
reviewTitle: Amazing location, Great service, Comfy and Clean!
propertyResponse:
Dear Jason,

Warmest greetings from Royal Malioboro by Aston...

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Royal Malioboro by Aston. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our well-maintained facilities, convenient location, comfortable bed, and refreshing water pressure. It’s also wonderful to know that our breakfast met your expectations.

We truly appreciate your feedback regarding the outdoor dining area. Guest comfort is our priority, and we will certainly take your suggestion into consideration as we continuously strive to enhance the experience for all our guests.
We hope to welcome you back in the future for another enjoyable stay.

Warm Regards,
Vera Indah Pratiwi
General Manager

likedText:
The hotel is just next to Yogyakarta station, making it easy to travel to places as well as to the airport. 

On our last day, we left a jacket and the hotel swiftly arranged to mail it back to us in Singapore. We have since received the parcel well, which was nicely packaged. Thank you so much for your excellent service, Ilham & receptionist Dimas/ Aliffa!
reviewTitle: Comfortable & convenient stay, with excellent service staff
propertyResponse:
Dear Mr./Mrs. Aliah,

Warmest greetings from Royal Malioboro by Aston..

Thank you so much for your wonderful review.
We're truly delighted to know our location made your travels easier, and even more so that we could assist with returning your jacket safely to Singapore. Your kind words for Ilham, Dimas, and Aliffa mean a lot, we’ll be sure to pass along your appreciation to them.

We look forward to welcoming you back to Yogyakarta again soon.
Thank you.

Regards,
Vera Indah Pratiwi
General Manager

propertyResponse: Toutes nos excuses pour les problèmes que vous avez rencontrés. Nous avons pris note de votre expérience cette fois-ci. Soyez assuré que nous ferons tout notre possible à l'avenir pour vous garantir un excellent séjour parmi nous. Cordialement, Amelia.

likedText: Absolutamente nada. Recomiendo NO ALOJARSE!!
dislikedText:
Alojamiento en condiciones higiénicas pésimas: la primera noche, nada más llegar, nos dieron una habitación en el piso superior llena de cucarachas. Al comentarlo con el personal, nos dieron un spray para matarlas, pero lo que pasó es que empezaron a aparecer más y más. Nos tuvieron que cambiar de habitación... En esa no vimos cucarachas pero la habitación igualmente estaba sucia y olía muy fuerte a humedad. La pintura de las paredes se caía por todos lados debido a las humedades. Además, no habían vaciado las basuras. 

Ninguna de las 2 habitaciones tenía ventanas, ojo con eso porque las imágenes son engañosas, por lo que era imposible ventilar la habitación.

Además de todo esto, el último día vimos cenizas en el suelo de la habitación, que intuimos era de uno de los chicos del personal que entró cuando no estábamos, y NO a limpiar...

El personal no habla inglés. En 3 días no hubo limpieza de habitaciones, las toallas olían mal, etc.... UN HORROR. El peor alojamiento en el que he estado.

likedText:
Hotelnya luas,kamar mandinya juga luas,bersih,

stafnya juga baik,tapi waktu check out lupa bagi tips sama adek yg bantu angkat barang kami,

dislikedText:
Semua suka...

likedText: Primitive bathroom, no hot water. I left the place after one day because I wanted to take a proper shower. I reported the issue to Booking, who initially promised a refund but now refuses to return the money. They advised me to contact the property, but no one there speaks English... A NIGHTMARE!"
dislikedText: Primitive bathroom, no hot water. I left the place after one day because I wanted to take a proper shower. I reported the issue to Booking, who initially promised a refund but now refuses to return the money. They advised me to contact the property, but no one there speaks English... A NIGHTMARE!"

likedText:
We did get a good night’s rest. 
Courtyard pleasant.
dislikedText:
Bathroom tiny, shower almost over toilet and no basin. Casual hospitality at times. Small room. 
Needs brightening up.
reviewTitle: Transit one-nighter; felt like the old time backpacker stays

likedText: While passing through Yogyakarta, Ited, her husband, and Ari welcomed us with such kindness. They’re a wonderful, generous family who will introduce you to the local culture and know all the best tips for planning activities in the area. 😉
propertyResponse: Thank u for choosing Rumah Pagar Merah during in Yogya. Hope you got new  experiences. Thank u.

likedText:
There is no hot water. I think it should be mentioned and it's overpriced considering that fact.
The bed is comfortable, the staff is nice and the location is good
propertyResponse: Thank u for staying at Rumah Pagar Merah.  About the price, your periode of stay was high season. It was Eid Mubarak periode. Sorry for the inconvenience caused to u. Thank u.

likedText:
Such a lovely place, the hosts are so thoughtful and kind, the food was so delicious, as we had breakfast and dinner. Everything is clean and simple, cleaning is done every day, AC works well, and the garden is nice and quiet. Reachable easily and by foot from the train station, and close Malioboro and the Palace.
For the price, it can't be better!
propertyResponse: Thank you so much for staying at Rumah Pagar Merah. We were glad to know that you could enjoy the meals that we served for you. Hope you will visit Indonesia n Yogya again. Best regards.

likedText:
The owners are great and very helpful
My room was big and comfortable enough
The place is within walking distance from the train station and Borobudur bus stop
dislikedText:
There is no hot water (and no sink inside the room)
The WiFi works unpredictably, especially during bad weather
The room itself could be a bit tidier
reviewTitle: Cheap and nice, but has its downsides
propertyResponse: Thank u very much for staying a week at Rumah Pagar Merah. Sorry if you were disturbed by the unstable wifi signal due to bad weather.

likedText:
Simple but nice and affordable place. 
The location is great. It is a 10 minute walk from the train station and a 10 minute walk to the. Malioboro street. 
The owners are super friendly
propertyResponse: Thank u Matej for staying at Rumah Pagar Merah.. Hopefully you had lots of memories while in Yogya.

likedText: The hosts are very generous and nice, the location is great
dislikedText: All fine
propertyResponse: Thank u for staying at Rumah Pagar Merah. Hope you were satisfied with our service. Best regards.

likedText:
The host were amazing, the food too!

We had a great Time!!
dislikedText: Nothing
reviewTitle: It was really really nice!!! Thank you again
propertyResponse: Hi Eloise.. Thank u for staying 3 nights at Rumah Pagar Merah.. Hope you n your friend did not forget with Kebaya n Kain Batik..

likedText: We stayed a week here and loved it, Aunty and Uncle were so friendly and accomodating, it was like being looked after by our parents. Breakfast delicious, highly recommend the Tumeric rice, and also very yummy snacks around (thank you for feeding me so much kerupuk!) Location was great, in a quiet laneway and walking distance to nice cafes and warungs. Recommend OURS coffee and tea around the corner for a sunset drink!
reviewTitle: Homestay that feels like home, great location and lovely hosts.
propertyResponse: Hi Christine.. Glad to meet you all at Rumah PAGAR Merah. Hope you had little experience n sweet memory during a week here. Thank u very much..

likedText: Good omlette
reviewTitle: A homely clean and very friendly place to hang out
propertyResponse: Thank u Nigel for staying at Rumah Pagar Merah.. Enjoy your next trip.

likedText: The best part about this place are the owners who own it. The room is basic but clean and spacious with ac. I got food poisoning from somewhere and I was bedridden for quite a bit. The host- Ited- was always concerned and asked if I needed anything and even brought me tea to my room. Stayed here 3 nights and would come back. The courtyard is beautiful too and a great place to lounge. The owner also let us shower after we checked out which was very nice of her.
dislikedText: Lack of sink, and hot water in the shower as other reviews mentioned. It's fine for us, except when I was feverish so a cold shower wasn't ideal.
propertyResponse: Moha, thank u for spending 3 nights at Rumah Pagar Merah.. Actually u could ask to me for boiling water if u need. Sorry for the inconvenience caused to u.

likedText: The family is lovely and supporting the guests needs.
dislikedText: The sink, unfortunately, was outside of the room.
propertyResponse: Thank u very much for staying at Rumah Pagar Merah. Sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.

likedText: The hosts are very welcoming, kind and accommodating. The breakfast was delicious. This place is exceptional value for money. It's walking distance from Malioboro. Ited was kind enough to share tips about local attractions.
propertyResponse: Thank u very much for choosing Rumah Pagar Merah during in Yogya. Hope u can enjoy your next trip.

likedText:
The homestay’s owner are so friendly.
And they were very wiling to provide travel information.
I were happy to stay two nights here.
I liked the atmosphere here just like at home.😊
propertyResponse: Thank u Chiaying..  We are also glad to meet you here..  Enjoy your next trip.

likedText: It was in a perfect location, very walkable from the train station. Ited was lovely, made us feel very welcome and offered lots of suggestions + information for things to do. She recommended the Ramayana Ballet which we really enjoyed. The room was simple but comfortable, with good wifi + air con.
dislikedText: It would have been useful to have a sink in the bathroom.
propertyResponse: Thank u Harriet for staying at Rumah Pagar Merah n your  input for us. Enjoy your next trip.

likedText: it has aircon, toilet and beds so you could try to sleep
dislikedText:
Very noisy. Not only street noise but also noise from guests and locals.
No sink in the room for Rp 275K, really??
reviewTitle: should be better places to spend your money at
propertyResponse: Thank u for spending 2 nights at Rumah Pagar Merah. Sorry for the inconvenience caused to u.

likedText: The owners here are so friendly! Our hosts let us shower before we leapt aboard an 11hr night train which was really kind. We opted to eat breakfast in the homestay both days - it was tasty and very affordable. We also did a wash here and everything came back beautifully folded and ironed! There's a folder you can look through to check out tours (either options to the temples just out of town or to Bromo and Ijen). In all, they couldn't have made our stay easier. They were very accommodating.
It was a clean and nice place
dislikedText: Nothing it was perfect

likedText: Great location very close to Malioboro, very helpful and friendly hosts, amazing breakfasts, excellent value for money, fast Wi-Fi
dislikedText: No hot water
reviewTitle: Wonderful stay in a very helpful and friendly family run Homestay
propertyResponse: Thank u very much for choosing Rumah Pagar Merah during in Yogyakarta.

likedText:
The hosts are lovely, made us feel very welcome at all times and helped us to book trains online. They also allowed us to store our luggage and shower after check out before our night train.
Cooked breakfast are nice and great value. The house is just a ten minute walk from the train station and malioboro street.
reviewTitle: Excellent great value stay with lovely hosts

likedText: From the moment we arrived it was very easy to settle in. They offered us tea and snacks before we went up to our room which was nice and quiet. The food was great and the family who runs the hotel were very friendly and helpful in every way.  The location was great because it was set back off the main road and yet it was easy to get and around to the main attractions. When visiting Yogyakarta again in the future I would always come back to Rumah Pagar Merah Homestay.
dislikedText: There was nothing to dislike, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Rumah Pagar Merah Homestay. They went out of their way to make our stay comfortable and help coordinate our day trips and even toured us down to the river and through the neighborhood behind the homestay. Wonderful people.
reviewTitle: I would only check in to Rumah Pagar Merah Homestay when in Yogyakarta and I will be back.
propertyResponse: Hi Bob.. Thanks for choosing Rumah Pagar Merah to stay during in Yogyakarta. We are glad to know u will back to Yogya again.. We will wait for u. See u again..

likedText: The host family was very sweet. Not all of them spoke English well, but they were very involved with how we were doing and even offered us tea and sweets. The room itself is somewhat basic but very comfortable. It’s nice that it’s in an alley, a bit away from the main street.
dislikedText: There was no sink, which meant we had to wash our hands by using the shower.
propertyResponse: Marc thank u for choosing Rumah Pagar Merah for staying in Yogya. Hope someday u will be back again.

likedText: Ited and her husband are very friendly and helpful about everything.
reviewTitle: Very nice. Will come back again.
propertyResponse: Thank u very much Anil.. Have a nice flight to Bali.. Bye.. Bye..

likedText: This accommodation was well located, close to the city centre and very close to the train station. The room was clean and spacious with comfortable bed and well working AC, wifi work great as well. The hosts were amazing, very kind and helpful. They help us with renting a motorbike for a fair price, advise us interesting places around and draw it to our attention it's necessary to have an online reservation to Borobudur and Prambanan temple. Because we stayed couple of night there, the host provide us interesting breakfast which was simply, but was local and it was great experience for us.
dislikedText: There was no wash-basin in our room, but we didn't mind. There is cold water in the shower only, but because days were very hot, it was no problem and shower were refreshing for us.
propertyResponse: Adéla n Martin thank u for choosing Rumah Pagar Merah during stayed a week  in Yogya. Hope u have many experiences n memories here. Gbu both.

likedText: Great location just a short walk from the main railway station. The hotel is not particularly charming but rooms are spacious and AC is ok. Rather good value for a short stay in Yogyakarta
dislikedText: No breakfast (not a problem really)
reviewTitle: Great location - good place for a short stay

likedText: Very clean and quiet. Drinking water supply is very convenient. The location of the hotel is very good, close to the train station. The staff were very friendly and helped us. If I came back to Yogyakarta, I would choose this hotel again.
De locatie en goede airco
dislikedText: Het was onwijs vies. Veel haren in het doucheputje, vlekken in de lakens en veel haren en vuiligheid op de grond, alsof er niet was schoongemaakt.

likedText:
Location and the family who owns the place . 
Polite and nice people living there.
dislikedText:
People talking loud outside the hotel at any hour of the night.  Very hard to sleep cause never quiet   . 
Not hot water in the shower . No sink in the bathroom.  
Smelly bathroom.

likedText: Felt very homey and welcoming every time we returned to the facility. Staff were very helpful with advice and directions
dislikedText: Included breakfast was disappointing. Just toast, although there were coffee and tea making facilities available

likedText: Rudi the owner was a great man. The location of the home stay couldn’t be better, really close to  Malioboro street. The AC was working properly and let us sleep really well.
dislikedText: As a foreigner, we are use to have the sink inside the toilet wich it was not in this case but we saw that this is something common around the whole city.

likedText: The location, the service (breakfast)
dislikedText: It's located in a lil alley
reviewTitle: Overall it was a nice stay

likedText: good location, cheap
dislikedText: the smell was really bad. the breakfast wasn’t that nutritious.  you have to bring your own toilet paper
propertyResponse:
Thank you for your review, we greatly appreciate the time you have taken to provide us with this valuable feedback.
We are very sorry to hear that you didn't have a great experience with us – our mission is to provide excellent guest experiences, so we are sorry to have let you down.

likedText: What I like about the homestay is the proximity of the railway station. It is also in a walking distance to the popular Malioboro street where you can find restaurants and shops. The owners are very nice and helpful.
dislikedText:
The room in which I stayed had no window. The smell of naphtalene balls was very unpleasant. They didn't provide neither towels nor basic toiletries. There is no proper shower, no to mention hot water. 
Nevertheless, the worst thing was the noise. The rooms open into the living room where the family members spend most of their time. The owners have two little grandchildren. No way you can get some rest before the whole family goes to sleep. Though the owners were sweet and good-natured, my stay was uncomfortable.
propertyResponse:
Thank you for your review, we greatly appreciate the time you have taken to provide us with this valuable feedback.
We are very sorry to hear that you didn't have a great experience with us – our mission is to provide excellent guest experiences, so we are sorry to have let you down.

likedText: Good location and very nice owner
dislikedText: You need to know that you get what you pay for, affordable accommodation but no bedsheets (cover) and no towels.
propertyResponse:
Thank you for your review, we greatly appreciate the time you have taken to provide us with this valuable feedback.
We are very sorry to hear that you didn't have a great experience with us – our mission is to provide excellent guest experiences, so we are sorry to have let you down.

dislikedText:
The place is not suitable for weastern travelers at all.
Bathroom was in disgusting conditions (there were no shower) and the room overall was too tiny and dirty.
The person at the door wasn't able to speak english and didn't do anything to make us feel comfortable.
We left 2 minutes after having arrived because no homestay should look like that.
We ask for a refund and they never came back at us.
Worst experience in Indonesia ever..

likedText: Very friendly family, good price close to train station
dislikedText: A little hard to find because down alleyway

likedText: We hebben de locatie gekozen omdat het nabij het station lag, prettig als je de volgende dag weer op doorreis moet.
dislikedText: De kamer was een hele kleine ruimte waar precies een twee persoons bed in paste. Onze twee backpacks konden we amper kwijt. Boven de deur was er een soort raampje open naar de gang en er zaten glazen stenen in de muur waar veel licht doorkomt ook snachts als de lampen nog aanzijn in de hal. Naar de kamer zit een kleine badkamer met toilet en douche, in principe oke maar let op: geen toiletpapier of handdoeken en de deken was een fleece dekentje. Nogmaals voor een nachtje op doorreis prima.

likedText:
L accueil familial .eau café thé.proximite de la gare train et de la rue principale 
Mini ruelle sans circulation.tres calme
Personnel gentil, bon emplacement. Bon rapport qualité/ prix
dislikedText: Le petit déjeuner "compris" n'en est pas vraiment un. Une tasse de thé et 2 tranches de pain de mie toasté entre elles et c'est tout.

likedText: Sehr einfaches Hotel in guter Lage mit sehr nettem und hilfsbereiten Personal. Es ist eine sehr einfache Unterkunft, aber wer mehr als ein Dach über dem Kopf und ein eigenes Bad nicht braucht - findet alles in diesem Homestay
dislikedText: Es gab kein heißes Wasser
reviewTitle: Einfache Unterkunft zu einem sehr fairen Preis
propertyResponse: Thank you for your review! We're glad you found our hotel's location convenient and our staff nice and helpful. We apologize for the inconvenience with the hot water. Your feedback is valuable, and we'll address this issue promptly. We hope to welcome you back for an improved stay in the future.

likedText: La famille qui vit là est foncièrement gentille et attentionné. J'ai été dans plusieurs hôtels/auberges/homestay et c'est sûrement l'endroit récemment où je me suis senti le plus sincèrement accueilli.
dislikedText: L'emplacement est très dur à trouver et ils ne sont pas très réactif par WA ou booking. Quand je suis arrivé le premier jour j'ai dû prendre une chambre dans un hôtel à côté car je ne trouvais pas
reviewTitle: Un départ compliqué mais des personnalités adorables
propertyResponse: Thank you for your feedback! We're delighted you felt sincerely welcomed by our kind and caring family. We apologize for any inconvenience during your departure and the challenges with finding our location. We appreciate your patience and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a smoother stay.

likedText: Sehr zentral gelegene Unterkunft, unweit des Bhf (fußläufig 8 Minuten) Sehr einfache Zimmer aber vollkommend ausreichend für einen Kurzaufenthalt in Yogyakarta. Sehr freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal. Die Mitarbeiter /Eigentümer standen stets mit hilfreichen Auskünften zur Seite. Für den Preis absolut top - zumal ein einfaches Frühstück ebenfalls inkludiert war.
dislikedText: Einfacher Sanitärstandard
propertyResponse: Thank you for your review! We're pleased you enjoyed our central location, friendly staff, and value for money. We appreciate your feedback on sanitation standards and will address it promptly. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

likedText: Die Gastgeber waren sehr nett. Die Unterkunft liegt in der Nähe des Bahnhofs.
dislikedText: Es roch unangenehm. Obwohl Handtücher und Toilettenpapier bei der Ausstattung aufgeführt waren, gab es diese nicht. Es war sehr laut und die Matratze war durchgelegen.

likedText: 駅から数分で、とても場所が良かった。
dislikedText: 部屋の日当たりが悪くて、狭く、風通しも良くなかった。
reviewTitle: 駅前で安かったので仕方ないです。ケチらなければ良かったです。
propertyResponse:
Thank you for your review, we greatly appreciate the time you have taken to provide us with this valuable feedback.
We are very sorry to hear that you didn't have a great experience with us – our mission is to provide excellent guest experiences, so we are sorry to have let you down.

likedText: Absolutamente nada.
dislikedText: Todo es asqueroso. Todo lo que se anuncia en Booking es mentira: no hay sábanas, solo una manta que daba asco, no había pila en el baño, no había papel higiénico ( le preguntamos al dueño por papel y nos dijo que nos compráramos en el minimarket de enfrente, lo cual me parece vergonzoso), había un agujero en la pared, de TV plana ni hablar aunque no es lo que más me importa de un alojamiento, el olor de la habitación como a producto químico insoportable y además el hombre iba fumando por ahí por lo que en la habitación se sumaba el olor a tabaco. No nos quedamos a dormir ni la primera noche del asco que daba, reservamos otro hotel y nos fuimos. Cuando salíamos a darle la llave, el hombre estaba tirado en el suelo en una especie de habitación al lado de la entrada y no hizo absolutamente nada cuando le dijimos que nos íbamos porque todo olía muy mal y no estaba en buenas condiciones, le dio completamente igual, total el ya había cobrado. Vamos a poner una reclamación a booking y exigir la devolución y que retiren ese alojamiento de la web porque no se merece estar anunciado de lo asqueroso que es todo. NO LO RESERVEIS!!! Ni para una noche !!!

likedText: Ubicación excelente y personal muy atento, te ayudan en todo. Muy cerca de Malioboro, sin estar en medio del bullicio.
dislikedText: Por ponerle una pega, desayuno un poco pobre.

likedText:
Les hôtes sont très chaleureux et bienveillants.
Le petit déjeuner était très chouette, fait sur demande et avec beaucoup de coeur. Il nous a permis d’échanger avec notre hôte qui était un amour de femme. 
La chambre était propre, avec une salle d’eau/wc privative, la climatisation, et une superbe literie.
Du thé et du café sont mis à disposition.
La connexion wifi était très bonne.
A 3 minutes à pieds de la gare et de Malbioro, super emplacement.
dislikedText:
Tout était très bien. 
Ne vous attendez pas à un hôtel 5 étoiles, il n’est pas vendu en tant que tel. 
Les murs sont fins et il y a un peu de bruit, ce qui est normal pour un emplacement pareil.
Cela n’empêche en rien de dormir et de passer un très bon moment à Yogyakarta et avec les hôtes.
reviewTitle: Un homestay pas cher qui vaut le coup !

likedText: Nach der ersten Nacht habe ich das Homestay verlassen, obwohl ich 5 Nächte gebucht hatte. Der Besitzer wollte kein Geld für diese Nacht. Habe natürlich trotzdem bezahlt
dislikedText:
Voll ausgestattetes Bad? Habe ich nicht gefunden. Kein Handtuch, Nur kaltes Wasser, kein Waschbecken.
Keine Bettwäsche, alles sehr laut. Der Besitzer raucht sehr viel und der Rauch zieht in alle Bereiche

We asked for a breakfast box on one morning as we had a 4am trip booked & this was ok.

likedText: Griya Langen feels like you stay in your own house. A traditional Javanese house inside so homie. Its very close to the public park. The people so friendly.

likedText: Nice garden area.
dislikedText: This guesthouse now has a nightly karaoke party until midnight in which the music is so loud you literally cannot hear another person speak and certainly can't enjoy relaxing in your room, and my requests to turn down the volume a little were completely ignored. Also, as other travelers have reported, this place is a mess and badly maintained, and in my case involved a toilet that leaked water over the entire bathroom floor when flushed. I left after one night, and my request for a refund was totally ignored.

likedText:
You will meet very friendly owners and stay in a relatively big room- in front of the room is this little garden and the only thing you here- even your are in the center of yogya- are birds. Restaurants and Bars are in walking distance (approx 10-15min). 
Bed was comfy- there is cold and hot water to drink or make coffee/tee. Would come back anytime in Yogya and regretted to stayed at another place first.

La propreté qui laissait vraiment a désirer, surtout la salle de bain. Des cadavres de cafards (ça ma femme n'a vraiment pas aimé) beaucoup de calcaire , et de trace de saleté douteuses, et des toiles d'araignée partout. La clim pas tres efficace et la literie moyenne.
Propre ça pourrait être très bien.

likedText: Lokasi Penginapan dekat alun alun & area foodcourt

Hébergement de dernière minute pour le nouvel an, j’ai eu de la chance, un joli jardin, emplacement au calme, et gros coup de main des propriétaires pour me déplacer alors que tous les drivers étaient occupés !

dislikedText: kamar yang kami tempati sudah waktunya direnovasi karena banyak property yang sdh usang dan tidak dilakukan perawatan, kamar mandi terasa sangat lembab dan kurang dijaga kebersihannya
reviewTitle: merasa tidak mendapatkan apa yang seharusnya diterima dengan harga yang dibayarkan

likedText: Le calme du jardin, la bonne humeur et serviabilité des hôtes, le quartier à taille humaine, la modicité du prix.
dislikedText: Un témoignage (en français) a critiqué l’insuffisance de propreté… Ce n’est peut-être pas faux, selon les normes auxquelles les voyageurs occidentaux sont habitués. Équipements un peu anciens, sans doute.
reviewTitle: Un endroit agréable, reposant, après avoir dû quitter inopinément un hôtel bien côté mais agité.

likedText: L'emplacement.
dislikedText: Propreté douteuse, pas de possibilité de petit déjeuner, la douche.

likedText: Secara umum, cukup menyenangkan selama menginap disni, susana yang nyaman ala rumah nenek (kebetulan menyewa satu rumah), fasilitas cukup memadai, full kitchen, lokasi strategis dan mudah dicari
dislikedText: beberapa bagian tampak kurang terawat, seperti ada bagian tembok yang sudah mulai usang, pintu bagian belakang yang sudah kurang baik, keran shower salah satu kamar mandi yang rusak, bagi yang membawa mobil, parkiran cukup terbatas

reviewTitle: This guesthouse/hotel should not be operated at all as the room and bathroom are full of mold.

likedText: The location is very strategic, near Malioboro. The staff is very excellent.
dislikedText: During our visit, some renovation happened and we were not informed. The hotel owner should have informed us earlier about the renovation because it feels uncomfortable for my family.
reviewTitle: Good place to stay and worthy.

likedText: Love the ambience of the homestay. A lot of communal spot that comfortable to use. Very friendly and helpful staff. Delicious and simple breakfast

dislikedText: OK for solo men as a woman I didn't feel comfortable nor did my friends. We checked out early. WiFi bad for working.

likedText: Helpful Hotel staff Near from Malioboro and other heritage culinaire destination
Pegawai ramah
dislikedText: Fasilitas ada yang perlu perbaikan seperti tombol shower dan TV yang belum diupdate android tv

likedText: Tempat nya bagus dan strategis
dislikedText: Ac bocor dan selang rusak
reviewTitle: Lebih ditingkatkan lagi pelayanan dan fasilitas nya

likedText: Lokasinya strategis dan yg paling saya suka staf ramah, di loby ada mushola jd ketika tamu sdh cek out msh bs solat dimushola dekat loby
dislikedText: Kamar sudah bangunan lama, soket colokan yg jebol dibiarkan jd mengganggu pemandangan u sekelah home stay ya lumayan

likedText: Suasana nyaman berasa rumah sendiri.lokasi strategis kemana mana dekat .next akan menginap lagi disini jika ke Yogya dan semua staf nya ramah2 dan membantu.
Dekorasi kamar nya minimalis tapi kelihatan luas, bersih
dislikedText:
Katanya hotel syariah, tapi kenapa ada sepasang wisatawan mengkonsumsi BIR ya..
Setau Saya, seorang muslim tidak mengkonsumsi BIR..
Tapi entahlah.. Saya hanya heran.

Di pagi hari yang sibuk buat wisatawan... Listrik mati dari jam 6.30an -10.00 WIB.
Alhasil, AC mati yang menjadikan kamar pengap dan air kamar mandi tidak bisa dipakai mandi karena mengalirnya kecil. 
Begitu pula closet nya.... Aliran air kecil, kotoran tidak bisa bersih sempurna .
Seumur-umur taru kali ini ngalamin penginapan tidak punya generator untuk cadangan listrik
reviewTitle: Kurang nyaman waktu ada pemadaman listrik

likedText: Kamer was groot maar niet rustig, de wasmachine of droger hoorde je constant die stond op de gang. En de kamer kan niet doorluchten, het rook erg naar schoonmaakmiddel. Wel netjes verder.
reviewTitle: Erg centraal, prima kamer voor kort verblijf

likedText: Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit! Schöne Einrichtung mit Küche.
dislikedText: Intensiver Raumduft im Zimmer. Flecken auf der Bettdecke.

likedText: Petit-déjeuner disponible mais uniquement repas local (dommage) - Très belle ambiance et beau décor - calme - idéal pour personne seule ou en famille - chambre climatisée - hôtel pas très loin du centre avec taxi GRAB via la même application
dislikedText: Salle de bain un peu démodé
reviewTitle: Qualité/prix excellent - chambre propre - hôtel bien tenu - ambiance familiale - à conseiller

likedText: Goed gelegen ben bij verschillende toeristische bezienswaardigheden. Zeer vriendelijk personeel. Propere kamers, handdoeken,koffie, thee en lekker ontbijt. Gezellige lobby let fijne gemeenschappelijke ruimte. Bibliotheek.
dislikedText: Niets
reviewTitle: We hadden een orima verblijf en zouden hier zeker terugkomen. Een aanrader!

likedText: 店员的服务态度好，笑容迷人。这点非常棒！

房间卫生非常差。1、厕所门关上后就打不开，需要朋友从外面打开才能出去。2、洗手盆漏水，拧开水龙头，脚就要湿了。3、浴室磁砖估计从未清洗过，浴帘一股臭味。
床太软，不舒服。
reviewTitle: 外部公共区域卫生是可以的，但房间内的卫生一定要改善，这是我遇到最脏的一间民宿。

likedText:
Emplacement, personnel, petit déjeuner ( indonésien)
Les espaces communs du RDC sont agréables

likedText: Personnel très gentil et à disposition. Bien situé. Petit déjeuner asiatique traditionnel correct.
dislikedText: Il y avait une odeur dans la chambre et dans la salle de bain. La douche est remplie de calcaire. Le ménage n'est pas fait au quotidien. Cela ne correspond pas aux attentes européennes. Confort minimaliste donc mais si on ne s'attarde pas sur ces critères, la chambre fait le job.

likedText:
A nice place to stay with your family or besties. They have living room and dining room, 3 bed room with 2 double bed and 1 twin sharing bed. For people who need more space with grup or family. This place is a very good place. 
For sure, this is a guesthouse not a homestay that live with different people, this place you stay with your group or family. 

Near alun alun utara just walk 12 minutes and near pasar ngasem, 10 minutes walk. Near RS muhammadiyah just walking across the street about 100 meter away. 
I walk 20 minutes to Malioboro, taking the short cut. 
I revision the google map name for this place because its not easy to find by place name in gojek. 
I guess now you can search it by name, “Griya Hanna”.
dislikedText: The homestay has 2 men live inside the house, for my family that have 3 daughter with hijab, is not comfort. While we choose this place to have a place that can mingle like at home, we can release our hijab. We cant do it. Good thing that the owner response our matter, so the keys of the house gave to us and the staffs left the house. They back again when we checked out.

likedText: Excellent location, friendly and accomodating hosts.
Spacious house, room and very clean. Kitchen utensill are full, staff really helpfull. Always take care and ask what we needed.
dislikedText: The Parking lot is only for small sedan if big car, the fence can not closed fully.

likedText: bersih dan staffnya very helpfull
dislikedText: non
pemanas air mandi tidak (rusak) berfungsi di Kamar 1

likedText:
Wir reisten als sechsköpfige Familie und haben deshalb das gesamte Gebäude (drei Doppelzimmer) gemietet. Ein echter Glücksgriff! Sehr geräumig, großer Gemeinschaftsbereich, Küche, ...! 
Der Hauswart wohnt ebenfalls in dem Gebäude. Ist wirklich sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit und trotzdem sehr, sehr unauffällig. Bei Ankunft hat er uns Kaffee und Tee angeboten. 
Als wir dann abends um 22:00 nichts mehr zum Essen fanden und der Pizzabringdienst auch schon zu hatte, hat er die Betreiber der gegenüber liegenden Pizzeria aus dem Bett geklingelt, die dann für uns noch einmal den Ofen angeworfen haben. 
Wir haben uns rundum sehr wohl gefühlt!
dislikedText: Klar könnten die Möbel moderner sein - aber mal im Ernst. Wir kommen aus zwei Jahren Pandemie! Wir haben in unserer vierwöchigen Indonesienreise sehr viel Unterkünfte gesehen, die die Pandemie bei weitem nicht so gut weggesteckt haben.
reviewTitle: Optimale Unterkunft für Familien / Gruppen bis zu sechs Personen. Top Lage. Sehr freundlich!

This is a hotel that stopped trying.  They offer a first floor coffee lounge yet no coffee served.  The rooms offer a laundry hamper yet the hotel doesn't have laundry service.  The night before I left, the front desk staff told me I need an hour to get to the airport.  The following day as I was waiting for a driver, the front desk staff told me I needed two hours and laughed it off.

Would urge booking.com to remove this hotel from it's website.  It's just not a hotel for tourists.

likedText:
Cama muy cómoda.
Desayuno: bien. Puedes pedir huevos y tienen fruta, tostadas, los típicos cereales azucarados y las opiniones locales que varían.

El personal es muy agradable, hablamos con ellos y nos cambiaron de habitación. Esta estaba un poco mejor, más nueva. Pero mismo ruido.
dislikedText:
Descripción general: Hotel grande situado cerca de la calle principal y a tan solo 1km de la estación de tren (20k en Grab).
La sensación general es de que el hotel vivió tiempos mejores y que necesita urgentemente mantenimiento.
Ruido: residual del tráfico desde la quinta planta. Y lo peor fue por la noche... ES COMO DORMIR DENTRO DE LA MEZQUITA. No está nada insonorizado y es horrible lo que se escucha el rezo a las 4 se la mañana. No hay tapones que valgan.
Wifi: fatal, imposible ver nada en linea o trabajar.
Limpieza: aceptable. El problema es más bien que todo es muy viejo menos los colchones. El baño es pequeño, pero ese no es el problema. Lo peor es que está viejísimo, oxidado...
